name: Our little doggo
description:
Our little doggo

This is my own new engine jam game with bitsy.

This is short climpse of my life in the form of game. 
Dont wate for fancy lines of text. Most of the time i was interested on bitsys capapilitys on different interesting action like "digging" :D.
